alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 4:01PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jefferson, southeastern Leon, Madison, western Lowndes and southern Brooks Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 401 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Quitman to 13 miles northwest of Madison to 11 miles southeast of Monticello. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Monticello, Valdosta, Madison, Quitman, Lake Park, Hahira, I-75 At Exit 16, Remerton, Dasher, Greenville, Alma, Cody, Pinetta, Drifton, Lovett, Empress, Clyattville, Brooks Co A/p and Hanson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
